Thammasat University: Thammasat University (TU; Thai: มธ.; Thai: มหาวิทยาลัยธรรมศาสตร์, RTGS: Mahawitthayalai Thammasat) is a public research university in Thailand with campuses in Tha Phra Chan, Rangsit, Pattaya and Lampang Province. As of 2019[update], Thammasat University has over 33,000 students enrolled in 33 faculties, colleges, institutes and 2,700 academic staff.[1][2]
